item.title: Runecrafting with ess tut plz
item.dc:creator: @sonjichan sonjichan
item.description:
@sonjichan wrote:

Well I don’t know of any tut, but there are ways to add make it so it requires items in your inventory.

Like when I went to fix the woodcutting on my server temporarily, till I could devise a better system, because like most people who code instead of C+P they like to be independent of tutorials. so I tried a really primitive system of skills.

This is a temporary woodcut code, theres a few things missing… like timer and woodcut prerequisites

[code]//Sonjichan - Temporary Woodcut

case 1278:
case 1276: //Normal tree
if(HasItemAmount(1349, 1) || playerRights >= 0)
{
actionTimer = 20;
pEmote = 875;
sendMessage(“You swing at the tree and get some logs!”);
addItem(1511, 1);
addSkillXP((50*playerLevel[8]), 8);
}
else
{
sendMessage(“You need an iron axe to cut these trees!”);
}

break; [/code]

With runecrafting, using a temporary solution, you’d probably want a timer since most servers have ::bank then, simply change the required materials, and the amount, and change the item it adds exp, skill ID, and emote… perhaps… and… how many of the new runes to add.

Read full topic
